stories.original_headline: Ghost particles slip through Earth and spark a hidden atomic reaction
stories.original_summary: Scientists have managed to observe solar neutrinos carrying out a rare atomic transformation deep underground, converting carbon-13 into nitrogen-13 inside the SNO+ detector. By tracking two faint flashes of light separated by several minutes, researchers confirmed one of the lowest-energy neutrino
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists have glimpsed invisible sprites, born from the sun, passing through the Great Earth. Deep within a shielded chamber, these sprites sparked a rare elemental shift, turning one essence into another. This mystical transformation was revealed by two fleeting glimmers of arcane energy.

stories.original_headline: Scientists find dark chocolate ingredient that slows aging
stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered a surprising link between dark chocolate and slower aging. A natural cocoa compound called theobromine was found in higher levels among people who appeared biologically younger than their real age.
stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Cocoa Beans May Grant Longer Lives!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has discovered a surprising secret within dark, bitter-sweet cocoa beans. A special essence was found in higher amounts among those who seemed younger than their true years. This wondrous finding suggests a path to ward off time's touch, perhaps granting longer, more vibrant lives.

stories.original_summary: The holidays have a way of sneaking up on us. One minute you're trick-or-treating with your kids, and the next you're panic shopping in a Buc-ee's gift aisle. But it doesn't have to be that way. With the right cheat sheet, you can keep the holiday spirit high and stress levels low. Fortunately, we d
stories.fantasy_headline: A Grand Scroll of Wondrous Midwinter Gifts!
stories.fantasy_story: The Midwinter Feast often arrives quicker than a nimble forest sprite. To help the townsfolk avoid last-minute quests for presents, the Scribes of the Royal Scroll have prepared a helpful guide. This enchanted list will ensure joyful celebrations and lighten the burden of gift-seeking for all.

stories.original_headline: The best instant cameras you can buy right now
stories.original_summary: Even with the ability to take excellent photos with our phones and instantly share them across the world, there’s something magical about the old-school instant camera. With just a click of a button, you can capture a moment in a photo that you can see and touch almost immediately. Images captured b
stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Boxes Capture Glimpses Instantly!
stories.fantasy_story: While scrying orbs can send visions far and wide, there's a special charm to the new Glimmer-Capture Boxes. With a mere click, these wondrous artifacts imprint a moment onto parchment almost immediately. Now, folk can hold their memories in hand, visible and true, without delay.
